name: mern-estate
description: 1. Create a folder named mern-esate(project name) 2. # Install React using vite  In the terminal run  > npm create vite@latest client choose  React then Javascript + SMC (for faster) 3. >cd client    >npm i (ti install react, react -DOM etc.)

scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
